title: Ticket #7139: Ubuntu nodes in CS Pool
description: Make our debs work well with in the CS department
remarks:
2019-Jul-08 11:45:19 by jfrey:
Code Review

/sbin/nologin and /bin/nosh don't exist on our Debian build machines or the CSL's Ubuntu machines. Do they belong in this list?

2019-Jul-08 11:59:00 by tim:
The CSL has entries from before Ubuntu that have /sbin/nologin and /bin/nosh that do appear on Ubuntu machines. If this entry comes from LDAP. It may contain one this these entries.

2019-Jul-08 16:27:20 by tim:
Internal issue. No documentation needed.
